recipesJson.name: Peach Foster Pudding Parfait  FLV
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
This is a twist on the classic Banana Foster.  This is a a booze free version, so feel free to add your favorite rum if you like. 
Flavorah Peach is the star of this recipe, and the apricot just adds a little extra boost to the flavor of the peach.  The Milk & Honey is just perfect to add  to help with the cooked aspect of the peach.  And what can I say about FLV Vanilla Pudding, it is delicious, and FLV Marshmallow Vanilla just adds a delicious touch to boost texture and fluffiness of parfait.  Tested on Asmodus C4 RDA .25 Î©hm 50 watts.  
Enjoy
 check out
 https://www.youtube.com/c/OGADIY
https://www.diyflavorchaser.com/tam-vapes

reviews.text: Wow I was pleasantly surprised at how sweet and excellent the peach plays in this mix. This was my first time trying FLV peach and had previously sided more towards JF honey peach but you definitely made the right selection here, will mix again ty!
